short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable business users to view and contribute to Data Catalog right inside any web app and report. Increase Data Literacy and trust.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to instantly find technical and business definitions and metadata of any metric or  data element in any web-based application or web report.  Users can select any text and search for available definitions and additional information in the Data Catalog with a single click. The extension provides a simplified Search interface of the full-featured Enterprise Search functionality of the DvSum Data Catalog application. Users can also contribute to the Data Catalog by suggesting edits to the definition and tagging business terms and datasets.
